transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ji Nidhi baat kar rahi IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha ji batao madam.
Executive: Ha sir aapka aapne customer care ko call kiya tha IndiaMART ke?
Customer: Ha bilkul kiya tha mujhe to samajh mein nahi aa raha karu kya.
Executive: Kya ho gaya hai?
Customer: Main na are maine aapko complaint kab lagai thi aapne bola 24 hours ke andar action le liya jayega aaj 48 ghante hone ja rahe hain koi action nahi liya gaya.
Executive: Aapke kisi bhi iski shyad aapne mujhe document share kara tha wo wala?
Customer: Are aap maine aapko sab share kar diya tha aapne mere ko kya bola complaint likhkar 24 hours ke andar aapko call aayega.
Executive: Achcha achcha ha ha ha ha aa gaya yaar are aap bhul jate ho aap kaise mera account handle karoge jab aap itna bhul nahi ho.
Customer: Are aap bhul jate ho aap kaise mera account handle karoge jab aap itna bhul nahi ho.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir maine uske team se baat kari thi.
Customer: Nahi aapne senior se baat nahi karai aapko bilkul aapko yaad hai nahi kuch bhi kara kya jaye idhar mera nuksan ho raha hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir mujhe sab yaad hai maine team se pucha tha to team ne ye bola hai jab aapka already yaha pe aapne aapki same usme teen char complaint thi ki matlab aapne product deliver kara hai par aapko payment nahi hua hai aap may se ye cheez face kar rahe hain na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: May se bhi even September aapne may mein bhi aapne complaint kari thi na same process ko lekar.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ki aapka paise mar liye hain mal nahi bhej raha call bhi nahi utha raha aisa kuch aapne likha tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to iske baad se jaise team ne aapko contact kara uske baad aapne mail pe koi revert nahi kara hai theek hai fir June mein aapka dobara se complaint aaya tha ki aapne as per the customer Priyanka aapne kuch.
Customer: Haan wahi to keh raha hu koi objection.
Executive: Ya objection koi le hi nahi raha karu kya main bataiye.
Customer: To sir aap ye to dekhiye na jab aap already matlab do teen customer ke sath aap aisa kar matlab ho chuka hai aapke sath ki aap product deliver kare par payment nahi aa raha to aapne is bar aisa kyun kar diya.
Customer: Are mujhe kya pata ye sare itne fraud log aayenge.
Executive: Sir aapka jab aap ye dekhiye na aap teen char bar matlab ek bar hota hai to insan dusri bar bharosa kar leta hai par aapne to teen char bar aapke sath aisa ho gaya to aap matlab bina full payment ke aap kyun ye matlab deliver kar rahe ho order ek normal si baat hoti hai sir.
Customer: To ab isme kuch hoga nahi hoga chalo maine kar diya ab aage se wo main dekhunga par ab isme kuch hoyega nahi hoga.
Executive: Isme to jo aapne mere ko company batai thi wo to sir usme to IndiaMART matlab ab to wo blacklist ho gayi hai wo tab registered hai nahi IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Agar wo IndiaMART pe registered hoti to definitely main iske bare mein main aapko kuch update kar paati.
Customer: To aap na hum logon ko aise koi business de rahe ho jab wo update hi nahi hai aur wo aa ja raha hai yaha par.
Executive: Wahi cheez main puchna chah rahi hu na matlab do teen bar agar aapke sath aisa ho gaya hai to aapne matlab ye kyun aapne product deliver kara hai jab teen customer se aapka already ho gaya tha.
Customer: Ab madam ab aisa kya pata hota hai madam wo meetha meetha bol dete hain theek hai ab aisa pata kya thi ki ye payment nahi dalega agar pehle se pata hota to fir to.
Executive: Par jab aapke sath already do teen bar ho chuka hai same us pe hi to aap matlab jab tak full payment na aaye tab tak to matlab ek bar insan ek bar dhokha khata hai to bar bar thodi na khata hai.
Customer: Wo baat aapki theek hai asal mein mere nahi mera chota bhai bhi use karta hai us pe ho gaya ye kaam.
Executive: Wahi baat hai na sir aap matlab usko abhi usko abhi join karwaya hai maine.
Customer: Wahi baat hai na sir aap matlab usko abhi usko abhi join karwaya hai maine.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. To aap ye cheez unse matlab bolte discuss karte ki matlab aapke sath aisi cheeze ho gayi hai to jab tak full payment na aaye tab tak matlab deliver kare product ya full bhi nahi at least 75% to payment aani chahiye thi na.
Customer: Wo baat ab theek hai ab kuch na kuch hoyega ki nahi ye bata dijiye ab jo ho gaya wo to ho hi gaya.
Executive: Haan sir to maine wo company ke bare mein check karaya tha par uska sir GST wagera kuch nahi sab suspend hai team ke side se.
Customer: Achcha to aapne mujhe bataya matlab to fir kuch nahi ho sakta na.
Executive: Kuch to nahi matlab confirm to main nahi bata paungi ki kuch ho payega kyunki wo company ka koi data hi nahi hai sir hamare pass.
Customer: Aapke pass nahi hai aap senior se baat karo us company ne join to kara hai na IndiaMART par kaise join kara hai usne.
Executive: Join kara hai par unka jo GST tha na wo yaha se blacklist ho gaya hai blacklist.
Customer: Are aise kaise blacklist are aise kaise blacklist ho jayega aapke pass uska data wagera rahega na.
Executive: Data hota hai sir par usme jo GST jisse matlab company identify karti hai jab wahi GST nahi hai to fir matlab wo data ka kya hi fayda hai.
Customer: Wo sirf ek company ka naam dikh raha hai ki is naam ki company thi.
Executive: Are is naam ki company thi to ye to uska data abhi main aapke yaha company mein kam kar raha hu abhi main chhod du aapke mere mera data to aapke pass rahega na ki falani company mein itne time tak kam kiya tha mere yaha par.
Customer: Wo data tab hota hai jab tak aap India mein paid subscription mein ho matlab ek bar aapki company kya kya usko hai na aapki aapki baton se to ab ye lag raha hai mam ab kuch hona jana nahi hai iska matlab.
Customer: Wo data tab hota hai jab tak aap India mein paid subscription mein ho matlab ek bar aapki company kya kya usko hai na aapki aapki baton se to ab ye lag raha hai mam ab kuch hona jana nahi hai iska matlab.
Customer: Jo gaye payment gaya mera to gaya.
Executive: Sir isme to matlab maine pucha tha is bar mein isme kuch ho nahi payega kyunki agar wo company IndiaMART mein registered hoti to definitely is pe team action leti.
Customer: Are koi action le liya pehle bhi meri complaint hai wo to action ho nahi paya ab tak payment nahi mil paya mujhe ab kya action loge aap log pehle kabhi maine aapka check kara tha pehle kabhi matlab kuch mail wagera pe aapne revert nahi kara hai.
Executive: Abhi bhi aap kisi senior ab maine aapse kaha mujhe senior se baat kara do aap senior se kisi se baat nahi karate apne.
Customer: Abhi bhi aap kisi senior ab maine aapse kaha mujhe senior se baat kara do aap senior se kisi se baat nahi karate apne.
Executive: Aapko bhi abhi abhi aapko IndiaMART mein aaye hue kitna time hua hai aap new aaye ho na.
Customer: Aapko bhi abhi abhi aapko IndiaMART mein aaye hue kitna time hua hai aap new aaye ho na.
Executive: Ha main isliye keh raha hu aapko knowledge nahi hai main baat aapki baton se lag raha hai mujhe.
Customer: Ha main isliye keh raha hu aapko knowledge nahi hai main baat aapki baton se lag raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai sir aapka sara data maine aapka check kara hai.
Customer: Aisa nahi hai sir aapka sara data maine aapka check kara hai.
Customer: Main check kara check check karne se nahi hota hai na.
Customer: Main check kara check check karne se nahi hota hai na.
Customer: Ab aise to mam hamare sath fraud hota rahega.
Customer: Ab aise to mam hamare sath fraud hota rahega.
Executive: Tabhi main wahi cheez main bol rahi thi na matlab agar aap full payment ka karke aap product aap dispatch karate to wo jyada achcha rehta kyunki ab kya ho gaya char complaint aapki already hai.
Executive: Tabhi main wahi cheez main bol rahi thi na matlab agar aap full payment ka karke aap product aap dispatch karate to wo jyada achcha rehta kyunki ab kya ho gaya char complaint aapki already hai.
Customer: Theek hai par aap panchvi bhi aap wahi galti kar rahe hain to aap kaise ho aap ye bataiye.
Customer: Theek hai par aap panchvi bhi aap wahi galti kar rahe hain to aap kaise ho aap ye bataiye.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Main close kar du sir is concern ko?
Executive: Main close kar du sir is concern ko?
Customer: Kya hua?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Concern close kar du main aapka ye wala?
Executive: Concern close kar du main aapka ye wala?
Customer: Main aawaz aapki samajh mein nahi aa rahi kya kehte ho main bol rahi hu main concern close kar du fir aapka ye wala.
Customer: Main aawaz aapki samajh mein nahi aa rahi kya kehte ho main bol rahi hu main concern close kar du fir aapka ye wala.
Customer: Close mat karo abhi open hi rehne do na abhi close kyun kar rahe ho mere ko aapke usme dikhai to dega ha mera koi to isme wo nahi nikala usko yahi chhod dijiye na usko close mat kariye.
Customer: Close mat karo abhi open hi rehne do na abhi close kyun kar rahe ho mere ko aapke usme dikhai to dega ha mera koi to isme wo nahi nikala usko yahi chhod dijiye na usko close mat kariye.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Ek minute.
Customer: Close karne se fayda kya?
Customer: Close karne se fayda kya?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Customer: Ha ji boliye.
Executive: Ha sir main abhi call arrange karati hu fir aapko.
Executive: Ha sir main abhi call arrange karati hu fir aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- No action taken on previous complaints.

- Payment not received for delivered products.

- Wants to talk to a senior executive.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the company's details.

- Informed that the company is blacklisted.

- Explained the importance of full payment before dispatch.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call for the customer.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaint, payment, blacklist, fraud, senior
